exploreMoreDescription: Discover our full range of premium vitamins and supplements
aboutContent: Natural immune system strengthening: Our bee propolis is one of the richest sources of natural bioflavonoids, making it the ultimate natural defense from nature. It naturally strengthens and supports the immune system and has been appreciated for centuries for soothing sore throats. Each highly effective capsule contains 1000 mg of fresh bee propolis extract. Our pure and natural capsules contain no artificial additives and are rich in powerful antioxidants like polyphenols and flavonoids. We offer a risk-free satisfaction guarantee.
descriptionContent: Propolis is a natural bee product collected from flowers and trees, containing tree resin, essential oils, wax, and antioxidant bioflavonoids that help maintain a healthy immune system. It's also rich in valuable minerals, amino acids, and vitamins like B1, B2, and C. Nutriota Bee Propolis Resin Extract offers nature's gift for your immune system and overall well-being in convenient capsule form. Each serving contains propolis extract for easy daily supplementation.
ingredientsContent: Standardised, purified propolis resin allergen: brewer's yeast powder, gluten capsule shell: gelatin release agent: magnesium stearate (vegetable origin), silicon dioxide
informationContent: Units: 73.8 gram | Brand: Nutriota | Format: Capsule | Age Range Description: Adult | Country of origin: United Kingdom
